verses.verse: The book <WG976> of the genealogy <WG1078> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> the son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> the son <WG5207> of Abraham. <WG11>

Abraham <WG11> became the father <WG1080> of Isaac. <WG2464> Isaac <WG2464> became the father <WG1080> of Jacob. <WG2384> Jacob <WG2384> became the father <WG1080> of Judah <WG2455> and <WG2532> his <WG846> brothers. <WG80>

Judah <WG2455> became the father <WG1080> of <WG1537> Perez <WG5329> and <WG1161> Zerah <WG1537> by Tamar. <WG2283> Perez <WG5329> became the father <WG1080> of Hezron. <WG2074> Hezron <WG2074> became the father <WG1080> of Ram. <WG689>
Ram <WG689> became the father <WG1080> of Amminadab. <WG284> Amminadab <WG284> became the father <WG1080> of Nahshon. <WG3476> Nahshon <WG3476> became the father <WG1080> of Salmon. <WG4533>

Salmon <WG4533> became the father <WG1080> of <WG1537> Boaz <WG1003> by Rahab. <WG4477> Boaz <WG1003> became the father <WG1080> of <WG1537> Obed <WG5601> by Ruth. <WG4503> Obed <WG5601> became the father <WG1080> of Jesse. <WG2421>

Jesse <WG2421> became the father <WG1080> of King <WG935> David. <WG1138> David <WG1138> became the father <WG1080> of <WG1537> Solomon <WG4672> by her <WG3588> who had been the wife of Uriah. <WG3774>
Solomon <WG4672> became the father <WG1080> of Rehoboam. <WG4497> Rehoboam <WG4497> became the father <WG1080> of Abijah. <WG7> Abijah <WG7> became the father <WG1080> of Asa. <WG760>
Asa <WG760> became the father <WG1080> of Jehoshaphat. <WG2498> Jehoshaphat <WG2498> became the father <WG1080> of Joram. <WG2496> Joram <WG2496> became the father <WG1080> of Uzziah. <WG3604>
Uzziah <WG3604> became the father <WG1080> of Jotham. <WG2488> Jotham <WG1161> became the father <WG1080> of Ahaz. <WG881> Ahaz <WG881> became the father <WG1080> of Hezekiah. <WG1478>
Hezekiah <WG1478> became the father <WG1080> of Manasseh. <WG3128> Manasseh <WG3128> became the father <WG1080> of Amon. <WG300> Amon <WG300> became the father <WG1080> of Josiah. <WG2502>
Josiah <WG2502> became the father <WG1080> of Jechoniah <WG2423> and <WG2532> his brothers, <WG80> at the time <WG1909> of the <WG846> exile to <WG3350> Babylon. <WG897>
After <WG3326> the exile to <WG3350> Babylon, <WG897> Jechoniah <WG2423> became the father <WG1080> of Shealtiel. <WG4528> Shealtiel <WG4528> became the father <WG1080> of Zerubbabel. <WG2216>
Zerubbabel <WG2216> became the father <WG1080> of Abiud. <WG10> Abiud <WG10> became the father <WG1080> of Eliakim. <WG1662> Eliakim <WG1662> became the father <WG1080> of Azor. <WG107>
Azor <WG107> became the father <WG1080> of Sadoc. <WG4524> Sadoc <WG4524> became the father <WG1080> of Achim. <WG885> Achim <WG885> became the father <WG1080> of Eliud. <WG1664>
Eliud <WG1664> became the father <WG1080> of Eleazar. <WG1648> Eleazar <WG1648> became the father <WG1080> of Matthan. <WG3157> Matthan <WG3157> became the father <WG1080> of Jacob. <WG2384>

Jacob <WG2384> became the father <WG1080> of Joseph, <WG2501> the husband <WG435> of <WG1537> Mary, <WG3137> from whom <WG3739> was born <WG1080> Jesus, <WG2424> who is called <WG3004> Christ. <WG5547>

So <WG3767> all <WG3956> the generations <WG1074> from <WG575> Abraham <WG11> to <WG2193> David <WG1138> are fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> from <WG575> David <WG1138> to <WG2193> the exile to <WG3350> Babylon <WG897> fourteen <WG1180> generations; <WG1074> and <WG2532> from <WG575> the carrying away to <WG3350> Babylon <WG897> to <WG2193> the Christ, <WG5547> fourteen <WG1180> generations. <WG1074>

Now <WG1161> the birth <WG1083> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> was <WG2258> like this; <WG3779> for after <WG1063> his <WG846> mother, <WG3384> Mary, <WG3137> was engaged <WG1064> to Joseph, <WG2501> before <WG4250> they <WG846> came together, <WG4905> she was <WG2192> found <WG2147> pregnant by the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>

Joseph, <WG2501> her <WG846> husband, <WG435> being <WG5607> a righteous <WG1342> man, <WG2532> and not <WG3361> willing <WG2309> to make <WG3856> her <WG846> a public example, <WG3856> intended <WG1014> to put <WG630> her <WG846> away <WG630> secretly. <WG2977>

But <WG1161> when <WG1760> he <WG846> thought about <WG1760> these things, <WG5023> behold, <WG2400> an angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> appeared <WG5316> to him <WG846> in <WG2596> a dream, <WG3677> saying, <WG3004> "Joseph, <WG2501> son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> don't <WG3361> be afraid <WG5399> to take to yourself <WG3880> Mary, <WG3137> your <WG4675> wife, <WG1135> for that <WG1063> which <WG3588> is conceived <WG1080> in <WG1722> her <WG846> is <WG2076> of <WG1537> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>

She <WG1161> shall bring forth <WG5088> a son. <WG5207> You <WG2532> shall call <WG2564> his <WG846> name <WG3686> Jesus, <WG2424> for <WG1063> it is he <WG846> who shall save <WG4982> his <WG846> people <WG2992> from <WG575> their <WG846> sins. <WG266>"

Now <WG1161> all <WG3650> this <WG5124> has happened, <WG1096> that it <WG2443> might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> by <WG5259> the Lord <WG2962> through <WG1223> the prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

"Behold, <WG2400> the virgin <WG3933> shall be <WG2192> with <WG1722> child, <WG1064> and <WG2532> shall bring forth <WG5088> a son. <WG5207> They <WG2532> shall call <WG2564> his <WG846> name <WG3686> Immanuel; <WG1694>" which <WG3739> is, <WG2076> being interpreted, <WG3177> "God <WG2316> with <WG3326> us. <WG2257>"

Joseph <WG2501> arose <WG1326> from <WG575> his sleep, <WG5258> and did <WG4160> as <WG5613> the angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> commanded <WG4367> him, <WG3880> and <WG2532> took his <WG846> wife <WG1135> to himself; <WG3880>
and <WG2532> didn't <WG3756> know <WG1097> her <WG846> sexually until she had brought forth <WG5088> her <WG846> firstborn <WG4416> son. <WG5207> He named <WG3686> him <WG2564> Jesus. <WG2424>
